issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.summary: HttpClient.send() changes order of POST values

comments.body:
I believe this is due to ti.modules.titanium.network.TiHTTPClient using a HashMap for parts

https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/master/android/modules/network/src/java/ti/modules/titanium/network/TiHTTPClient.java#L139

A HashMap does not guarantee ordering and it appears every time you add to it you mach the ordering of it.
